reviews.title: Lovely
reviews.review_text: Perfectly complements my antique dresser. The top embellishment is plastic and I almost took off a star‚Ä¶ but that fact will only ever be known by me and my maid, if she can even tell ‚Ä¶ certainly no one else has a reason to touch it and it certainly looks like metal.

reviews.title: Luxe Dupe
reviews.review_text: I was been dying for this mirror from Anthro and refused to pay their price . My mission was to find similar at a fraction of the price ! It's very light, assembling was easy enough . The top piece is actually a rubber piece that's screws into mirror . You cannot tell, I know I won't .. except a girl on the same mission. This can be mounted with back attachments or sat on a mantle pictured below.

reviews.title: Very happy
reviews.review_text: Very well made , sturdy yet very pretty . My daughter came in and said‚Äù oh mom you got the mirror from Anthropology! I didn't tell her it was from Walmart!

reviews.title: Gorgeous
reviews.review_text: This was the perfect piece at just the right price to complement the decor style of my bedroom. I don't have enough room for standing mirrors, but this was the perfect alternative. I could not be more in love both items in the photo from Walmart love their style

reviews.title: Great mirror but had quality flaw
reviews.review_text: Mirror is very beautiful. Great looking for the price but I received a faulty product. The hook that fits he metal arch was bent so i cannot screw one side of metal arch to the metal that is on the mirror. Its a great hassle to re-pack and return as well since its big mirror

The mirror is very nice and came perfect the assembly for the top part was super easy the only thing that gives it that rating is it does not look like the picture it is more of a bronze than a actual gold color

reviews.title: Would not recommend
reviews.review_text: For the money it was an OK purchase, but they're very cheap looking. The decorative piece the top is plastic. I ordered two of these and one of them the metal piece on the top that is screw the decorative piece to was bent. Also, the color of the picture the frames were a lot lighter. When they came in, they were almost black.

reviews.title: The wrong color/doesnt look as good as the picture
reviews.review_text: The mirror is black, not bronze, as in the picture. The scroll at the top is a cheap looking plastic that doesn't look like the picture. The picture looks very detailed, with no holes in the design. The one I received has holes (openings), not like the picture.

reviews.title: Inaccurate Design and Color
reviews.review_text: I was really disappointed with this mirror. The color shown online looked much lighter, but in person it's a noticeably darker shade. On top of that, the product photos (and even the instruction manual included in the box) show decorative swirls at the bottom corners, but the actual mirror does not have those details at all. It feels misleading to advertise it one way and then deliver something different. both the photos and description should be more accurate.

reviews.title: So cheap looking
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this, I originally bought the bronze but the color was really black with gold paint brushed over it and it looked terrible. I returned it and got the gold, it looked so cheap that even the Walmart employee handling my return commented on it. Such a disappointment.

reviews.title: new look
reviews.review_text: we have a double sink counter in our bathroom. for years we had smaller one-piece mirrors over each sink now the new mirrors are greatly larger for better coverage and makes the room seem larger
I ordered the gold, but the gold is too brown. I will have to spray it to look more gold and not look like plastic. Other than that, it's a good mirror for the money.

reviews.title: Vintage Mirror
reviews.review_text: Came just as pictured. Not too heavy but heavy enough to feel like good quality. Will be purchasing more for my house. The bronzed color is beautiful.

reviews.title: Plastic Trash
reviews.review_text: Plastic?! $100 and it's plastic?! The cheapest worst looking gold mirror. Unbelievable. Of course I can't return it because it's a big mirror. What a waste of money. So upset. With the way this economy is going with worse quality and higher prices, everything is getting ruined.
It's beautiful but longer than I expected. It doesn't fit on top of my fireplace but I put it in my dining room and it looks great!
I never received the mirror, they delivered it outside and someone stole it. I would of loved to receive it, it was such a good price.

reviews.title: NOT brass as advertised.....
reviews.review_text: I ordered the brass mirror. It is NOT brass! It is a very dark wood finish. The picture on the description is very misleading!!

reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
reviews.review_text: I ordered the mirror based on the one in the store. The one in the store was of a much better guality. This is not the same mirror. Certainly not of the same material or quality. You get what you pay for. I am disappointed with my purchase.

reviews.title: Nice piece of flair for my wall
reviews.review_text: Been wanting a mirror like this for so long but the prices were out of my range. Thank you Wal-Mart for this great price! This gives my house a nice flair and I can't help but look at it every time I walk by my wall.

reviews.title: Bronze Mirror
reviews.review_text: Went with the bronze color, it was darker than I expected but I'm happy with the way it turned out. Would go with gold if you're looking for a brighter color.

reviews.title: Looks almost black
reviews.review_text: I'm disappointed in the color of the frame. It looks black, not antique gold like the picture displays. Also, the trim that goes on top is cheap plastic. I'm keeping it and spraying it the color I want instead of trying to find another one.

reviews.title: Bad quality
reviews.review_text: It is not good quality at all. The design on the top is plastic and it is not pretty at all. At least not to me. I had to return it.

reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!!!!
reviews.review_text: Such a classy update to my bathroom! It looks so beautiful above my bathroom sink. It really adds a feminine touch that I love.
This mirror is perfect for the area I bought it for- I was going to order another one but it's out of stock unfortunately. Definitely recommend - look elegant on the wall.

I love the mirror. The only problem was the metal where the decorative piece goes was completely bent. I had to bang it as straight as I could. I had to use my own screws because it would hang tilted wrong with the little screws provided.

reviews.title: The level up
reviews.review_text: I am so amazed at how beautiful this BeautyPeak mirror is, fits perfectly in my bathroom. The vintage design and quality of it can't be beat. I highly recommend .

reviews.title: Beautiful mirrors!
reviews.review_text: I ordered two of these beautiful mirrors for my home. I received the mirrors in perfect condition. (They were very well packaged). The mirrors are very clear with absolutely no distortion. Easy to hang with included hardware. Great price for such good quality. I am very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.title: I like it, is so beautiful
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this mirror, it is so beautiful and looks very good quality. It is easy to install and I did it myself. The detail on top makes it look like a vintage mirror and that is what I loved the most. The price is incredible and it gives a beautiful touch to my space.
They look perfect on either side of my bed. For the price I am pleased.

reviews.title: Damaged
reviews.review_text: Mirror came completely shattered and missing the decorative piece on the top
The mirror was beautiful but missing the decoration parts.

reviews.title: Antique Mirror
reviews.review_text: Beautiful antique replica., making my space more appealing.

reviews.title: 1 of the mirrors were broken, when can I get it r
reviews.review_text: 1of the mirrors were. Broken

reviews.title: Gold accent mirror
reviews.review_text: This mirror is beautiful l, very heavy

reviews.title: Beautiful design, high quality.
reviews.review_text: This is a stunning mirror, and it is high quality. I highly recommend it, money well spent.
Didn't realize the decorative part was foam but once I put it up you can't even tell!

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: It was on sale! It looks great hanging over my fireplace- the mirror has a very subtle but nice tint to it

reviews.title: A big miss!
reviews.review_text: My daughter really wanted this but it arrived broken. Mirror glue to frame didn't hold and the color was dull.
Cheap looking, but not bad. Originally, I bought it for master bedroom, but left it at the entrance, which looked just right.

reviews.title: Looks cheap
reviews.review_text: Mirror looks cheap. Ornament on top is painted plastic.

reviews.title: Vintage mirror
reviews.review_text: I just love that vintage decoration.

reviews.title: Just stunning.
reviews.review_text: It's absolutely beautiful. I love it.

reviews.title: Don't buy
reviews.review_text: Very cheap quality, ‚Äúbronze‚Äù color looks more like mud. Returning to store!
I purchased this mirror for my daughter's sweet 16 for her sign.

reviews.title: beautiful mirrors and big too
reviews.review_text: this is a very good product for the money highly reccommend
The pictures make it look more gold/bronze but in person it looks more brown/black to me. Theres only a hint of gold in the design at the top.

reviews.title: Vintage Beauty
reviews.review_text: I love this mirror, for the price it's incredible I plan to order one more. The only downside is they use fedex for shipping.

reviews.title: Nice looking plastic framed mirror
reviews.review_text: This mirror gives the illusion that it is an expensive antique French mirror. However, it comes in two pieces and the frame and artistic detail is plastic.

I was replacing an older mirror that was no longer clear. The size of this one was perfect and the style was similar. Great price and packaged really well, delivered to the front door. It even fit on the existing screws in the wall!

reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror
reviews.review_text: Beautiful mirror. Exactly what I was looking for and the price point is incredible. Looks highly quality not cheap at all. Arrived perfectly packaged. Recommend 10 or of 10!

reviews.title: Nice look alike
reviews.review_text: Very nice look alike mirror. The top part is plastic, so the quality is not super luxe but for the price I paid I am happy. I bought it on sale, I wouldn't pay full price for it.
bronze is not as pictured at all :( such an ugly sad brown
i need to return this mirror. it doesn't work the the space.

reviews.title: Really Pretty
reviews.review_text: Beautiful vintage mirror, excellent value for the money and quality.
It's a beautiful piece. I'm very happy with this item. Well structured. CGR

reviews.title: Nice üëçüèΩ
reviews.review_text: Beautiful mirror . Leaning on a dresser I repainted ‚Ä¶. Bronze color is great
Plastic but doesn't look plastic, very lightweight so it was great for what I needed.

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.review_text: I love it. It was exactly what I was looking for.

reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror
reviews.review_text: Beautiful mirror, exactly what I wanted
Nice big mirror with nice design but doesn't weigh a ton.

reviews.title: Beautiful mirror
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful and simple mirror for a great price.

reviews.title: Lovely elegant mirror
reviews.review_text: Mirror has a slight wave in it but not worrisome
I color of the frame looks cheap but the design is pretty

reviews.title: Beautiful mirror
reviews.review_text: Beautiful mirror, nice size for over fireplace, shipped fast, packaged well.

reviews.title: Buying more
reviews.review_text: Soooo stinking cute! Goes on super well and sticks amazingly. Just as picture. Even better with my decor!

reviews.title: Good overall value
reviews.review_text: I liked that it was a good size for my living room, although id prefer it was a slightly lighter shade of bronze it still works well with my decor.

reviews.title: Exceptional dupe!!
reviews.review_text: Great product. Same look as the ones sold at higher end stores for much less!! Very satisfied with it and couldn't be happier to have saved so much!!
It's absolutely beautiful. I love the way. It looks on my wall. Very very nice. I'm very pleased.

reviews.title: Must Buy!
reviews.review_text: Love this mirror for the price! Super cute and trendy!

reviews.title: Perfect Addition
reviews.review_text: This was the most beautiful addition to my room! The size is perfect and the price was amazing!

reviews.title: spectacular
reviews.review_text: I purchased the larger mare the 41 in X 26 in I absolutely adore it and it's spectacular very well made I highly recommend this and I am considering purchasing a second one .. Enjoy üíì

reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!
reviews.review_text: I spent a lot of time looking for this style mirror and decided to order this one based on reviews. Very glad I did!! It was delivered undamaged. Great quality! Doesn't feel or look cheap! Very happy with this purchase! Highly recommend!!

reviews.title: Beautiful and elegant
reviews.review_text: im in love with this Bella vintage mirror,love the size and how it complement my dresser ..totally happy with my acquisition
Just beautiful! Fits in my dining room: gorgeous! Thanks it got here so quickly!
